mapper.select: select code, name as menuname,price from menu
select a.roomcode,a.name as name,b.typename as type,a.howmany,a.howmuch from room a, roomtype b where a.type=b.typecode(+)
select typecode,typename from roomtype order by typecode

select c.department_id as dep_id, c.department_name as dep_name, b.department_name as dname ,a.emp_name as mname from employees a, departments b, departments c where b.department_id(+)=c.parent_id and a.employee_id(+)=c.manager_id order by c.department_id
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{param2},price=#{param3} where code=#{param1}
